name: GenomicsSampleContainer
title: Genomics Sample Container
description: A ConceptMap used for the translation and recording of concepts from MDS source data(code-options) to equivalent Snomed CT codes, and FHIR spec.
purpose: ConceptMap used for the translation and recording the concepts on sample preservation (container types). This is intended for the element Specimen.container

target.display: Non-evacuated blood collection tube, ethylene diamine tetraacetic acid (physical object)
Evacuated blood collection tube transport container
target.comment: Medium tube classify as an example of a transport container. When this option is selected, fuurther clarification should be sought with the clinician-in-charge  to specifically identify it.
None tube classify as an example of a tube. When this option is selected, fuurther clarification should be sought with the clinician-in-charge  to specifically identify it.

target.display: Non-evacuated blood collection tube, lithium heparin (physical object)

target.comment: Any other suitable tube that is an alternative to concepts provided in this Conceptmap. This should be provided by free text.

target.display: Evacuated blood collection tube, ribonucleic acid stabilizer (physical object)

target.comment: Saline tube classify as an example of a sterile tube. When this option is selected, fuurther clarification should be sought with the clinician-in-charge  to specifically identify it.
Streck tube classify as an example of a tube. When this option is selected, fuurther clarification should be sought with the clinician-in-charge  to specifically identify it.
